channel.title: FrameHero Updates
channel.description: App updates for FrameHero - App Store Screenshot Studio

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
FrameHero 1.2

Project settings, sidebar switcher, and UI polish

  • Project settings page for per-project configuration
  • Sidebar project switcher with auto-open last project
  • Improved watch folder onboarding with setup tips
  • Polished localizations section UI
  • Container styling for settings and checklist views
  • Various UI refinements and production fixes

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
FrameHero 1.1

Bug fixes, UI polish, and improved translations

  • Improved AI translations with app context for better localization
  • Layer copy/paste support in the canvas editor
  • Improved capture flow — settings always shown on session start
  • Status bar override (9:41) now persists after locale changes
  • Left-aligned project grid layout
  • Various UI refinements

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
FrameHero 1.0

App Store Screenshot Studio

  • Automated locale switching from iOS Simulator
  • AI-powered metadata generation
  • Professional device frames
  • Multi-locale screenshot management
  • Direct App Store Connect upload
  • Redesigned home screen with project card grid

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
• App Preview Videos (Beta) — record, edit, and export App Store preview videos
  • In-app update notifications with release notes
  • Caption rendering and timeline sync fixes
